wrong-insert-query: The insert query is specified incorrectly
no-proper-braces: The query from here '{{initialValue}}' uses braces incorrectly
wrong-table-name: The table name is specified incorrectly
no-double-quotes-around-table-name: You should use double quotes to specify the name of a table
no-brackets-around-table-fields: You should wrap the fields of the table in brackets
no-single-quotes-around-default-value: You should wrap the default value of a string to single quotes
wrong-not-null-option: You specified the 'NOT NULL' option incorrectly
wrong-default-value: The default value '{{value}}' for the '{{dataType}}' data type is incorrect
no-fields: No any fields to define a table
wrong-max-size-parameter: The max size parameter for the field '{{name}}' is specified incorrectly
incorrect-field-name: The name of the field '{{name}}' is incorrect
field-name-too-short: The name of the field '{{name}}' is too short
field-name-too-long: The name of the field '{{name}}' is too long
no-field-in-table: The field '{{name}}' is not specified in the table
field-duplicate: The field '{{name}}' is already set in the query
